ticket.title: Mime::Type.parse ignores accept-params in the HTTP_ACCEPT header
ticket.original-body:
In the case that a client sends only a single media-range but nevertheless includes accept-params, as in
@@@ Accept: text/xml; q=1 @@@
Mime::Type.parse fails to recognize this as the :xml mime type as parse just looks up the raw string in Mime::Type.lookup. See here: https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/2-3-stable/actionpack/lib/action_controller/mime_type.rb#L90
It does seem odd that a client would send a header like this, but we encountered it in real life. Reading the HTTP 1.1 spec http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html it seems that the header is valid.
This is in Rails 2.3.8. A patch is forthcoming.

It does seem odd that a client would send a header like this, but we encountered it in real life. Reading the HTTP 1.1 spec http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html it seems that the header is valid.
This is in Rails 2.3.8. A patch is forthcoming.

In the case that a client sends only a single media-range but nevertheless includes accept-params, as in

Accept: text/xml; q=1

Mime::Type.parse fails to recognize this as the :xml mime type as parse just looks up the raw string in Mime::Type.lookup. See here: https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/2-3-stable/actionpack/lib/actio...

It does seem odd that a client would send a header like this, but we encountered it in real life. Reading the HTTP 1.1 spec http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html it seems that the header is valid.

This is in Rails 2.3.8. A patch is forthcoming.

version.body: Niels van de Ven of Tilburg ugg boots sale University said: 'In anthropology, they say if you are envied, you might act more ugg boots cheap socially because you try to appease those envious people.' He cited as an example the fisherman who shared his bigger catch around.In lab ugg kids experiments a group of people were made to feel like they would be maliciously envied by ugg classic cardy being told they would receive an ugg boots bailey button award of five euros. Sometimes the prize was deserved and ugg boots knit was based on the score they were told they had earned on a quiz. But sometimes it was ugg boots kids not based on ugg boots classic tall their score at all.The researchers ugg boots classic cardy thought that the deserved prize would lead to benign envy, while the undeserved prize would ugg classic tall lead to malicious envy.
